turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, yeah. I'm in need of some coffee. Can you get an order going at Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get you some coffee. Which starbucks should i order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from the the one on Clifton Boulevard in Cleveland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, get me one of those cinnamon cloud macchiato. Get me Make it a venti and I want almond milk with it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, i don't see that on the menu. bummer. sorry for the inconvenience. Did you want to select another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, give me 1 second here to find something else that's good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about you just get me an iced coffee latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti, and same thing again I want almond milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious. Please confirm that i got your order right. You said 1 venti iced caramel latte with almond milk and whipped cream from the starbucks on clifton blvd in cleveland.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I wanted an just an iced cafe latte with almond milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. 1 venti iced cafe latte with almond milk and whipped cream from the starbucks on clifton blvd in cleveland.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect. The order is going to be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Do it now, and let me know when it's ready to be picked up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. I've placed the order. It'll be ready in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for pick up, did you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: need anything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you're all set. Take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.
